mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM sale s LEFT OUTER JOIN saleType sT ON s.categoryIdx = sT.categoryIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN saleTradeType sTT ON s.typeIdx = sTT.typeIdx

SELECT saleIdx, s.memberIdx,s.addr1,s.addr2,s.area,sT.categoryName,sTT.typeName,s.totalArea, s.layer, s.tLayer,s.dong,s.ho,s.status,TO_CHAR(s.tradeDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') tradeDate FROM sale s JOIN member m ON s.memberIdx=m.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN saleType sT ON s.categoryIdx = sT.categoryIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN saleTradeType sTT ON s.typeIdx = sTT.typeIdx WHERE saleIdx = #{saleIdx}
